thread.title: Biden opts against White House run | Business Spectator
thread.title_full: Biden opts against White House run | Business Spectator

author: AFP
title: Biden opts against White House run | Business Spectator
text:
US Vice President Joe Biden has announced he will not run for the White House in 2016, removing a potential obstacle to frontrunner Hillary Clinton's path to the Democratic presidential nomination.
"I believe we're out of time, the time necessary to mount a winning campaign for the nomination," Mr Biden said on Wednesday.
He was speaking in the White House Rose Garden with President Barack Obama and his wife Jill at his side.
"While I am not going to be a candidate, I will speak out clearly and forcefully as to where we stand as a party and where we need to go as a nation," Mr Biden said.
